```{r}
ttAsianVarsLong <- readRDS("../../data/240715_ttAsianVarsLong.rds")
ttAsianVarsLong$varComponent <- factor(ttAsianVarsLong$varComponent, levels=c("var.coef", "var.mode", "cov.mode"))
ggplot(ttAsianVarsLong, aes(x=cellType, y=value, group=varComponent, fill=varComponent)) +
  geom_col(position="dodge") +
  theme_classic() +
  xlab("Cell type") +
  ylab("Variance component value") +
  scale_fill_discrete(name="Variance component", labels=c(expression("Variance " ~ hat(beta) * " "),
                                                          "Variance mode",
                                                          "Covariance"))
  
```
